data.name: Trainz Plus DLC - CFCLA, RailFirst, Freightliner GE C44aci Pack
data.detailed_description:
The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators. The design is based on the National Rail NR class but with some modifications and upgraded features.

This locomotive includes:

5 Changeable Weathering Options

An Advanced Custom Cab

Opening & Closing Engine Doors

Opening & Closing Cab Doors

Opening & Closing Windows

Changeable Unit Numbers (for coal trains)

Changeable Marker Light Formations

ILR Holder Toggle On/Off

Number Board Light On/Off

Crew On/Off

Emissive Headlights & Ditch Lights

Hood, Step & Coupler Lights On/Off

Blinds Raised/Lowered

Full PBR Texturing



This Pack Includes:

CFCL C44 CF4412 Black Cavier

CFCL C44 CF T1

CFCL C44 CF T2

RFAM C44 CF T1

RFAM C44 CF T2

FTLR C44 CF T2

data.short_description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed operated by a number of rail freight operators. This pack features CFCLA, RailFirst, and Freightliner livery units, with custom cab views, full PBR textures, and more.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
